item.title: A Novel Read
item.description: What novel shall I read next? This always seems to induce fomo / decision paralysis in me. Like - what if I choose a book which is not the best book ever written that will change my whole perspective on myself and the world around me? First let us investigate how I have approached this problem in the past, and how well that has turned out for me. These are the last three novels I have read (most recent first); The Painted Man - Peter V.
